import React from 'react' import { NavLink, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import CircleButton from '../CircleButton/CircleButton' import { countNotesForFolder } from '../notes-helpers' import './NoteListNav.css' import NotesContext from '../NotesContext' export default class NoteListNav extends React.Component { static contextType = NotesContext; render() { const { folders=[], notes=[] } = this.context return (
    {folders.map(folder =>
  • {countNotesForFolder(notes, folder.id)} {folder.title}
    • )}

Folder
) } }
